com.metsci.glimpse.support.shader.point

Class PointFlatColorProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metsci.glimpse.support.shader.point.PointFlatColorProgram

  • public class PointFlatColorProgram
extends Object
    Draws 2D point with feathered edges, a constant pixel radius, and a color specified per point.
